overview: Erotic episodes celebrating the sun-soaked sensuality of those long hot days of summer.  Kurt Marshall does his best to please demanding tennis coach Tom Mitchell. Pool man Mark Kline and gardener Giorgio Canali arrive to work at Jim Bentley's home.  Bentley invites his friend Brian Maxon over to the pool, and Maxon brings along his friend Marshall.  Gymnasts Joe Cade and Justin Cade relax after a hard workout.
title: Splash Shots: Memories of Summer
